name: Pepperoni Pinball
description:
> Press up key to start

Welcome to my Pong!- What's that you say? The ball? We have the new and improved: pepperoni pizza. Help this 🍕 eliminate all the enemy blocks using wasd or arrow keys.

> Refresh page to replay. End card doesnt like pizza yet, buttons in development.

> leave a comment! ♡  

New features are in the works, and I'd love some feedback
